title: The noblenesse of the asse A worke rare, learned, and excellent. By A.B.
author: Banchieri, Adriano, d. 1634.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be sold by William Barley, at his shop in Gratious streete,
notes: Preface signed: Attabaliba of Peru, i.e. Adriano Banchieri.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
